verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Have Your way (Have Your way) Have Your way (Have Your way) Holy Spirit fill our hearts And have Your way{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}As we wait(we wait on You Lord) And as we pray(we pray to You) Speak Your Word into our hearts And have Your way{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Speak Your Word into our hearts And have Your way{/lang-eng}
